title: Metropolitan Tea Blue Ceramic Teacup and Saucer Set
features: Includes a matching cup and saucer
description: Serve your favorite tea for yourself with this teacup and saucer set. The ceramic design helps keep your tea hot for longer, and the shiny, blue finish means it will go with any decor from modern to classic styling. The classically designed set includes a matching cup and saucer, and will become a favorite, go-to set in your household. This is the perfect combination for a cup of coffee, tea, or hot cocoa.
Cup -- 3-1/2" diameter, with a 6 ounce capacity; Saucer -- 6" diameter
